thread.title: Nadal routs Wawrinka to reach Shanghai semifinals
thread.title_full: Nadal routs Wawrinka to reach Shanghai semifinals

title: Nadal routs Wawrinka to reach Shanghai semifinals
text:
Tennis Rafael Nadal routs Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. AP | Shanghai, October 16, 2015 | UPDATED 17:57 IST Mail A+ A- Nadal hadn't won against a top-five player since last year's French Open final. (AP Photo) 
Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. 
The fourth-seeded Wawrinka missed wildly on his groundstrokes throughout the match, finishing with 34 unforced errors. He was coming off a tough three-set victory over Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals that finished close to midnight the night before. 
Also read: Don't know if I can win another Grand Slam, says Nadal 
Nadal hadn't won against a top-five player since last year's French Open final when he defeated No. 2 Novak Djokovic for his 14th Grand Slam title. 
Nadal will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the semifinals on Saturday after the French player topped Kevin Anderson of South Africa 7-6 (6), 5-7, 6-4.
